verses.verse: Therefore thou shalt love <WH157> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and keep <WH8104> his charge <WH4931>, and his statutes <WH2708>, and his ordinances <WH4941>, and his commandments <WH4687>, alway <WH3117>.

And know <WH3045> ye this day <WH3117>: for I speak not with your children <WH1121> that have not known <WH3045>, and that have not seen <WH7200> the chastisement <WH4148> of Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>, his greatness <WH1433>, his mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and his outstretched <WH5186> arm <WH2220>,
and his signs <WH226>, and his works <WH4639>, which he did <WH6213> in the midst <WH8432> of Egypt <WH4714> unto Pharaoh <WH6547> the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and unto all his land <WH776>;

and what he did <WH6213> unto the army <WH2428> of Egypt <WH4714>, unto their horses <WH5483>, and to their chariots <WH7393>; how he made the water <WH4325> of the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220> to overflow <WH6687> them <WH6440> as they pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> you <WH3068>, and how Jehovah hath destroyed <WH6> them unto this day <WH3117>;
and what he did <WH6213> unto you in the wilderness <WH4057>, until ye came <WH935> unto this place <WH4725>;

and what he did <WH6213> unto Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48>, the sons <WH1121> of Eliab <WH446>, the son <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>; how the earth <WH776> opened <WH6475> its mouth <WH6310>, and swallowed them up <WH1104>, and their households <WH1004>, and their tents <WH168>, and every living thing <WH3351> that followed <WH7272> them <WH7130>, in the midst of all Israel <WH3478>:
but your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> all the great <WH1419> work <WH4639> of Jehovah <WH3068> which he did <WH6213>.

Therefore shall ye keep <WH8104> all the commandment <WH4687> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>, that ye may be strong <WH2388>, and go in <WH935> and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776>, whither ye go <WH5674> over to possess it <WH3423>;

and that ye may prolong <WH748> your days <WH3117> in the land <WH127>, which Jehovah <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto your fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> unto them and to their seed <WH2233>, a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

For the land <WH776>, whither thou goest in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it <WH776>, is not as the land of Egypt <WH4714>, from whence ye came out <WH3318>, where thou sowedst <WH2232> thy seed <WH2233>, and wateredst <WH8248> it with thy foot <WH7272>, as a garden <WH1588> of herbs <WH3419>;

but the land <WH776>, whither ye go <WH5674> over to possess <WH3423> it <WH776>, is a land of hills <WH2022> and valleys <WH1237>, and drinketh <WH8354> water <WH4325> of the rain <WH4306> of heaven <WH8064>,

a land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> careth for <WH1875>: the eyes <WH5869> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> are always <WH8548> upon it <WH7225>, from the beginning of the year <WH8141> even unto the end <WH319> of the year <WH8141>.

And it shall come to pass <WH8085>, if ye shall hearken diligently <WH8085> unto my commandments <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>, to love <WH157> Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and to serve <WH5647> him with all your heart <WH3824> and with all your soul <WH5315>,

that I will give <WH5414> the rain <WH4306> of your land <WH776> in its season <WH6256>, the former rain <WH3138> and the latter rain <WH3138>, that thou mayest gather <WH622> in thy grain <WH1715>, and thy new wine <WH8492>, and thine oil <WH3323>.
And I will give <WH5414> grass <WH6212> in thy fields <WH7704> for thy cattle <WH929>, and thou shalt eat <WH398> and be full <WH7646>.
Take heed <WH8104> to yourselves <WH3824>, lest your heart be deceived <WH6601>, and ye turn aside <WH5493>, and serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and worship them <WH7812>;

and the anger <WH639> of Jehovah <WH3068> be kindled <WH2734> against you <WH6113>, and he shut up the heavens <WH8064>, so that there shall be no rain <WH4306>, and the land <WH127> shall not yield <WH5414> its fruit <WH2981>; and ye perish <WH6> quickly <WH4120> from off the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> giveth you <WH5414>.

Therefore shall ye lay up <WH7760> these my words <WH1697> in your heart <WH3824> and in your soul <WH5315>; and ye shall bind <WH7194> them for a sign <WH226> upon your hand <WH3027>, and they shall be for frontlets <WH2903> between your eyes <WH5869>.

And ye shall teach <WH3925> them your children <WH1121>, talking <WH1696> of them <WH3427>, when thou sittest in thy house <WH1004>, and when thou walkest <WH3212> by the way <WH1870>, and when thou liest <WH7901> down <WH6965>, and when thou risest up.
And thou shalt write <WH3789> them upon the door-posts <WH4201> of thy house <WH1004>, and upon thy gates <WH8179>;

that your days <WH3117> may be multiplied <WH7235>, and the days <WH3117> of your children <WH1121>, in the land <WH127> which Jehovah <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto your fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> them <WH3117>, as the days of the heavens <WH8064> above the earth <WH776>.

For if ye shall diligently <WH8104> keep <WH8104> all this commandment <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> you <WH6213>, to do it <WH157>, to love Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> in all his ways <WH1870>, and to cleave unto him <WH1692>;

then will Jehovah <WH3068> drive out <WH3423> all these nations <WH1471> from before <WH6440> you <WH3423>, and ye shall dispossess nations <WH1471> greater <WH1419> and mightier than yourselves <WH6099>.

Every place <WH4725> whereon the sole <WH3709> of your foot <WH7272> shall tread <WH1869> shall be yours <WH4057>: from the wilderness, and Lebanon <WH3844>, from the river <WH5104>, the river <WH5104> Euphrates <WH6578>, even unto the hinder <WH314> sea <WH3220> shall be your border <WH1366>.

There shall no man <WH376> be able to stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> you <WH3068>: Jehovah your God <WH430> shall lay <WH5414> the fear <WH6343> of you and the dread <WH4172> of you upon <WH6440> all the land <WH776> that ye shall tread <WH1869> upon <WH1696>, as he hath spoken unto you.
Behold <WH7200>, I set <WH5414> before <WH6440> you this day <WH3117> a blessing <WH1293> and a curse <WH7045>:
the blessing <WH1293>, if ye shall hearken <WH8085> unto the commandments <WH4687> of Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>, which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>;

and the curse <WH7045>, if ye shall not hearken <WH8085> unto the commandments <WH4687> of Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>, but turn aside <WH5493> out of the way <WH1870> which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>, to go <WH3212> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, which ye have not known <WH3045>.

And it shall come to pass <WH3068>, when Jehovah thy God <WH430> shall bring thee into <WH935> the land <WH776> whither thou goest <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it <WH5414>, that thou shalt set the blessing <WH1293> upon mount <WH2022> Gerizim <WH1630>, and the curse <WH7045> upon mount <WH2022> Ebal <WH5858>.

Are they not beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383>, behind <WH310> the way <WH1870> of the going down <WH3996> of the sun <WH8121>, in the land <WH776> of the Canaanites <WH3669> that dwell <WH3427> in the Arabah <WH6160>, over against <WH4136> Gilgal <WH1537>, beside <WH681> the oaks <WH436> of Moreh <WH4176>?

For ye are to pass over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> to go in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> you <WH3423>, and ye shall possess it <WH3427>, and dwell therein.
And ye shall observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all the statutes <WH2706> and the ordinances <WH4941> which I set <WH5414> before <WH6440> you this day <WH3117>.
